text: Joseph Peter Pantoliano (born September 12, 1951) is an American actor. He is known for his roles in Risky Business, The Goonies, La Bamba and Midnight Run. He has also played Captain Conrad Howard in the Bad Boys trilogy and Ralph Cifaretto during seasons 3 and 4 of The Sopranos. ==References== Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:People from Hoboken, New Jersey
title: Joe Pantoliano
